channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Catholic sphere
channel.desc: Doug Keck and his panelists discuss St. John Henry Newmans essay on the development of doctrine and the fruit of his movement toward the Catholic Church and away from Anglicanism.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Rosary, The-Spiritual Sword of Our Lady
channel.desc: Fr. Donald Calloway looks at the history of the rosary, its victories and its champions, in a presentation.[(96057)]
